resources.string: Playlist with channels failed to load
The configured provider or playlist cannot be reached. Please re-check the provider settings and if they seems OK, contact your IPTV provider.
This video requires external player for best experience
Stream not reachable (cannot connect). Contact your provider
Stream not reachable. Contact your provider
Access denied (incorrect key?). Contact your provider
Your provider does not provide archives for this channel
Storage access is required. Provide an access and retry the operation
Swap main channel and PiP one
frequency (favorites first, then most frequent channels)

Application sorts channels by watch frequency. Channels you marked as favorite will always be in the top. You may disable automatic sorting by enabling using a provider channel order, however favorites filter will not be available.

If source is playing badly, you can try increasing buffer size in settings, switch to another stream decoder (hardware or software), or if anything fails, configure to use an external player for a playback.
You can configure automatic stream switching off after some idle time (useful when billed per-minute). Idle means no player actions used (for example: menu, seeking, pause, etc).
NOTE: You need an OTT/IPTV provider in order to use this application.
Application works with user-provided playlists only.
Configuration error. Failed to load data
contains no supported live channels. Check username/key/password/url.
